title: Center of Excellence | UPMC Addiction Medicine Services
description: The Center of Excellence opens access to addiction medicine services for those who have an opioid use problem and have Medicaid, making it easier for individuals to get the help they need.

Center of Excellence: Opioid Use
Helping People with Medicaid Access Opioid Addiction Treatment
The purpose of the Center of Excellence (COE) is to open access for people with an
opioid use problem and have Medicaid
. We hope to decrease barriers to those who need access to opioid treatment and services.
The COE is a part of outpatient addiction medicine services at UPMC Western Psychiatric Hospital.
The center is located in Oakland at:
3501 Forbes Avenue, Suite 860,
Pittsburgh, PA 15213
We're open from 8:30 a.m. to 5 p.m., Monday through Friday. We welcome both walk-ins and scheduled appointments and provide a warm, friendly environment to those in need.
People with  substance use issues other than opioids, or those without Medicaid, can find help at
UPMC Addiction Medicine Services
. Please make an appointment with the Center for Psychiatric and Chemical Dependency Services (CPCDS) on UPMC Western Psychiatric Hospital’s ninth floor.
Need Help for Yourself or Someone You Love? Contact Us
To confirm times and schedule an appointment at one of our locations below, call
412-692-2273
.
Oakland
Center of Excellence: Medicaid Access Opioid Treatment
Open weekdays from 8:30 to 5 p.m. for walk-in and scheduled appointments.
3501 Forbes Ave., Suite 860,
Pittsburgh, PA 15213
Center for Psychiatric and Chemical Dependency Services
3501 Forbes Ave., Suite 860,
Pittsburgh, PA 15213
Wilkinsburg
Narcotic Addiction Treatment Program
225 Penn Ave.
Pittsburgh, PA 15221
South Side
Quantum One Building
2 Hot Metal St.
Pittsburgh, PA 15203
Our Opioid Use Treatment Services
At the  COE, our program is unique and has great flexibility in that it tailors services and integrates community-based options.
We can follow and support you even if you don't come to us formally for therapy.
Opioid use services we provide include:
Case management, screenings, assessments, and in-person support by our trained staff and peer navigators.
Formal one-on-one counseling through our on-site therapist.
Intensive outpatient and psychoeducational groups through the CPCDS.
If you're already receiving therapy, recovery specialist, or case management services, you can still use the COE. When you build a relationship with the COE team, we make sure it won't  hinder or negate your  current treatment services.
If you don't use therapy or do need formal care assessments,  the COE offers clinical services that we'll bill to your insurance.
These include:
Specialized support for addiction
Integrated care for substance use and mental health disorders
Custom-tailored treatments to meet your needs
We look forward to helping you access recovery providers within the Pittsburgh area. By doing so, we hope that you can take the next steps of your journey hand-in-hand with those who care.
Our Mission
The mission of UPMC Addiction Medicine Services is to provide compassionate care for individuals whose lives have been impacted by substance use and mental health concerns.
